page.title: 13Caravan Sites
page.content: Three smaller caravan sites open off the A6 but the largest, the Six Arches Site,off Station Lane, Scorton,in an attractive loop of the River Wyre.It has 280 vans,most privately owned.Ten vans are rented for weekly holidays and there are six flats.Touring vans are also welcome.The site is open in winter. Facilities include showers, launderette, amusement arcade,shop,heated swimming and paddling pools and play equipment.There is a popular licensed club.Many regular visitors are from Manchester and the E.Lancs.towns.They enjoy country walking and fishing. Blackpool,Morecambe and the Lakes are only an hour away by car.
